alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:25PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 600 PM MST... At 525 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coolidge Airport, or near Coolidge, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Coolidge, Randolph, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 128 and 134. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 129 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
